Final Fantasy VII Remake is superb for a lot of reasons. It's beautiful, carefully crafted, fun to play, and it expands greatly on the setting and fantastic cast of the original. Characters such as Jessie now get more screen time and back sto… [+939 chars]

articles.author: Dan Thorp-Lancaster
articles.title: Lenovo's budget IdeaPad 5 with latest AMD Ryzen CPUs now available - Windows Central
articles.description: Lenovo's new IdeaPad 5 is now up for grab in both the U.S. and UK. Starting at around £405 or $690 depending on your model, the laptop is a budget affair, but it should still pack plenty of power thanks to AMD's latest mobile chips.
articles.content: Lenovo has a new budget laptop on the scene, and it's chocked full of new AMD goodness. The new Lenovo IdeaPad 5 is now on sale in both the U.S. and UK, bringing AMD's latest Ryzen 4000 Series chips at a price that doesn't break the bank. You can currently sc… [+995 chars]

articles.author: Chris Pereira
articles.title: It Seems Like Nook's Cranny Is Closed For Everyone In Animal Crossing Today - GameSpot
articles.description: With my store closed in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, what am I even supposed to do, be patient?
articles.content: Animal Crossing: New Horizons might primarily be a game you play solo or with a small group of people, but one of the fun things about it is the sense of community that surrounds it. Some of that stems from the use of a real-time clock; for better or worse, w… [+3645 chars]
